named-query.name: plananual.get.all.institucion.activos
named-query.query: select o from PlanAnual o where o.institucion.insId = ?1 and o.regActivo = 1

named-query.name: plananual.get.all.institucion
named-query.query: select o from PlanAnual o where o.institucion.insId = ?1

named-query.name: auditoria.get.all.institucion
named-query.query: select o from Auditoria o where o.planAnual.institucion.insId = ?1 and o.regActivo = 1

named-query.name: auditoria.get.all.institucion.plan
named-query.query: select o from Auditoria o where o.planAnual.institucion.insId = ?1 and o.planAnual.plaId = ?2 and o.regActivo = 1

named-query.name: tipoauditoria.get.all.active.institucion
named-query.query: select o from TipoAuditoria o where o.institucion.insId = ?1 and o.regActivo = 1

named-query.name: auditoria.get.max.id
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM Auditoria a where a.planAnual.institucion.insId = ?1 order by a.audCorrelativo DESC

named-query.name: unidad.get.all.institucion
named-query.query: select o from Unidad o where o.institucion.insId = ?1 and o.regActivo = 1

named-query.name: usuario.get.all.institucion
named-query.query: select o from Usuario o where o.institucion.insId = ?1 and o.regActivo = 1

named-query.name: usuario.get.coordinador
named-query.query: select o.usuario from AuditoriaResponsable o where o.auditoria.audId = ?1
